data.actual_result: See the first word and the entire second and subsequent words gone
data.expected_result: See the first word and a partial of the second word in the name
data.short_description: Names of long group DMs with 2 or more words in may get entire words cut off instead of breaking at the end of the scroller
data.steps_to_repro: - Make a group DM - Name it with around 12 chars in the first word and 20+ in the second (example amounts, will probs work with more) - Open the friends list scroller
